attributes.action: include Facebook as a valid Extenuating Circumstances for all universities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Universities define Extenuating Circumstances as circumstances relating to a student’s health and /or personal life which are of a sufficiently serious nature to result in either her or his being unable to attend, complete, or submit an assessment on time or her or his performance in an assessment being significantly affected. 

We look to petition the Prime Minister to validate Facebook be as a valid option on all Extenuating Circumstance Forms (ECF), across all universities because of its overall effect on both our mental and physical capabilities and its underlying addictive nature.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
